properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing and validating JWT tokens for authentication

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: Time duration in milliseconds before JWT tokens expire

properties.name: thread.pool.size
properties.description: Maximum number of threads available in the application thread pool for concurrent operations

properties.name: storage.filesystem.directory
properties.description: Absolute path to the directory where satellite imagery and other files will be stored

properties.name: python.backend.url
properties.description: Base URL endpoint for the Python backend service responsible for image processing and analysis

properties.name: rate_limit.max_requests
properties.description: Maximum number of API requests allowed within the specified time window

properties.name: rate_limit.time_window_millis
properties.description: Time window in milliseconds during which the maximum request limit applies

properties.name: analysis.valid_types
properties.description: Comma-separated list of valid satellite image analysis types supported by the platform

properties.name: cache.redis.ttl_seconds
properties.description: Default time-to-live in seconds for Redis cache entries before automatic expiration

properties.name: cache.redis.prefix
properties.description: Prefix added to all Redis cache keys to prevent collisions with other applications

properties.name: cache.cleanup.max_infrequent_access_count
properties.description: Maximum allowed access count threshold below which cache entries are considered infrequently used and eligible for cleanup

properties.name: cache.cleanup.inactivity_threshold_days
properties.description: Number of days of inactivity after which cache entries become eligible for cleanup

properties.name: cache.cleanup.cron
properties.description: Cron expression that defines the schedule for automatic cache cleanup operations

properties.name: project.base.path
properties.description: Base directory path for project-specific resources and configurations

properties.name: rate-limit.cleanup-interval
properties.description: Time interval in milliseconds between rate limit cache cleanup operations

properties.name: audit.log.path
properties.description: File path where application audit logs will be stored for security and compliance purposes

properties.name: app.initial.admin.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable or disable automatic creation of an initial administrator account on application startup

properties.name: app.initial.admin.username
properties.description: Username for the initial administrator account created during application bootstrap

properties.name: app.initial.admin.email
properties.description: Email address for the initial administrator account created during application bootstrap

properties.name: app.initial.admin.password
properties.description: Password for the initial administrator account (should be changed after first login)

properties.name: messaging.attachments.max.size
properties.description: Maximum allowed size in bytes for files attached to messages within the platform

properties.name: messaging.attachments.allowed.types
properties.description: Comma-separated list of MIME types allowed for file attachments in the messaging system

properties.name: messaging.user-to-admin.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable or disable direct communication channels between users and administrators for support

properties.name: messaging.user-to-bot.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable or disable AI chatbot support for user assistance and basic queries

properties.name: messaging.user-to-user.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable or disable direct messaging between platform users for collaboration

properties.name: messaging.cleanup.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable or disable automatic cleanup of old or expired messages to conserve storage

properties.name: messaging.rabbitmq.enabled
properties.description: Flag to globally enable or disable the RabbitMQ-based messaging functionality within the application

properties.name: communication.type
properties.description: Communication protocol type used for inter-service communication (e.g., REST, gRPC, AMQP)

properties.name: messaging.queue.dlx.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable or disable Dead Letter Exchange functionality for handling failed message deliveries

properties.name: messaging.retry.max-attempts
properties.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed message deliveries before sending to DLX

properties.name: messaging.retry.initial-interval
properties.description: Initial wait time in milliseconds before the first retry attempt for failed messages

properties.name: messaging.retry.multiplier
properties.description: Multiplicative factor applied to the retry interval for each subsequent retry attempt

properties.name: external.app.endpoints.image_processor
properties.description: URL endpoint for the external image processing service used for satellite imagery analysis

properties.name: communication.file.size.threshold
properties.description: File size threshold in bytes that determines when to switch from in-memory to disk-based file transfer

properties.name: grpc.client.address
properties.description: Hostname or IP address of the gRPC server for remote procedure calls

properties.name: grpc.client.port
properties.description: Network port number on which the gRPC server is listening

properties.name: grpc.client.max-message_size_mb
properties.description: Maximum allowed size in megabytes for gRPC message payloads

properties.name: grpc.client.use_transport_security
properties.description: Flag to enable or disable TLS/SSL encryption for secure gRPC communications

properties.name: grpc.client.shutdown_timeout_seconds
properties.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait for graceful shutdown of gRPC client connections

properties.name: storage.temporary.redis-prefix
properties.description: Prefix used for Redis keys that store temporary file references and metadata

properties.name: storage.temporary.filesystem-path
properties.description: Directory path where temporary files are stored before processing or permanent storage

properties.name: storage.temporary.inactivity-duration
properties.description: Maximum duration in seconds that temporary files can remain unused before becoming eligible for cleanup

properties.name: storage.temporary.post-access-duration
properties.description: Duration in seconds that temporary files are retained after their last access before cleanup

properties.name: storage.temporary.cleanup-cron
properties.description: Cron expression defining the schedule for temporary file cleanup operations

properties.name: spring.webflux.max-in-memory-size
properties.description: Maximum size in bytes of data buffers that can be held in memory when processing web requests

properties.name: web_client.memory.buffer.size
properties.description: Size in bytes of the memory buffer used by WebClient for processing HTTP request/response data

properties.name: cache.redis.max_infrequent_access_count
properties.description: Maximum access count threshold for Redis cache entries below which they are considered infrequently used

properties.name: cache.redis.inactivity_threshold_days
properties.description: Number of days of inactivity after which Redis cache entries become eligible for eviction

properties.name: spring.cloud.config.enabled
properties.description: A description for 'spring.cloud.config.enabled'
